ns0:DryadDataFile.ns2:title: Figure 8 data
ns0:DryadDataFile.ns2:description: Annual temperature precipitation data within the extant range of Abies alba used to make histograms of precipitation abundance frequencies and mean July temperature frequencies. Data are from grid cells of the Climatic Research Unit Ten Minute Climatology (http://www.cru.uea.ac.uk/cru/data/hrg/tmc/). Column 1) precipitation abundances of each individual grid cell within the Abies alba range, column 2) mean July temperature in each individual grid cell within the Abies alba range.
